name: ASB Demodemo
description:
ASB is a Turn based RPG where you play rhythm microgames to win.

You find yourself stuck inside a warehouse. Find a way out of there, that is, if Ratton and his gang let you.

Things that look like they escaped some SCP facility! Amateurish music! Maybe actually good written characters! Metamodernist jokes all kids love! Everything needed for it to be a modern media ready to be consumed is here. god I hate my life ghgh g hgg .

Play the game.
